org.jplot2d.interaction

Class MouseDragBehavior

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jplot2d.interaction.MouseBehavior
      • org.jplot2d.interaction.MouseDragBehavior
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MouseAxisPanBehavior, MouseAxisRangeZoomBehavior, MouseColorbarBehavior, MouseMarqueeZoomBehavior, MouseMoveComponentBehavior, MousePanBehavior

    public abstract class MouseDragBehavior
extends MouseBehavior
    A behavior triggered by mouse dragging. The MouseButtonCombination for this behavior:
    • modifiers: the modifiers while mouse dragging. Notice the modifiers include the down buttons.
    • clickCount: 0
    • button: the pressed button to start the dragging

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MouseDragBehavior(java.lang.String name) 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected boolean isMoveAware()
      If true, the interaction manager will send mouse move events to handler of this behavior.
